name: open-music-api
author: farismnrr
description: A back-end API for managing music data, built with Node.js and Hapi framework.

scripts.build: npm install && bun copy-env && bun generate-token && bun migrate up
scripts.build:server: npm run build && echo HOST=0.0.0.0 > .env.production && sudo npm i -g pm2 && pm2 start bun --name "open-music-api" -- run start:prod
scripts.build:docker: npm run build && docker build -t farismnrr/open-music:3.0 .
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src --ext js --exec "node src/server.js"
